How to Make Money Buying Art: Advice From Art Market Economist Magnus Resch https://www.coindesk.com/consensus-magazine/2024/01/25/how-to-make-money-buying-art-advice-from-art-market-economist-magnus-resch/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source =rss&utm_campaign=头条新闻SCONYQSDEFBP5JZXV6VPXMDL74 Daniel KuhnIn his latest book, the Yale economist guides prospective buyers through never overpaying for art by examining the data and curating relationships. It turns out NFTs have particular utility here. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 14:58:09 +0000 2024-01-25T15:00:51.635+00:00 Consensus MagazineinterviewOpinionArtNFTs magnus resch、nft 艺术、数字艺术、如何购买艺术品、如何收藏艺术品、“如何收藏艺术品” Phaidon，艺术市场经济学家Magnus Resch argues in his latest book NFTs could reshape how art markets operate, and potentially bring in new buyers. (Phaidon)
